about_the_game:
Bring your model railway dreams to life with TRS22 Model Railroaders Edition, where cutting-edge technology meets the charm of classic layouts. Whether you're a seasoned enthusiast or just starting out, TRS22 Model Railroaders Edition offers endless possibilities to create, play, and explore.

Why Model Railroaders Edition is the Ultimate Model Railway Experience:

  • Next-Gen Simulation: Harness the power of the latest TRS22 code to experience your model railways like never before. Realistic visuals, smooth operations, and limitless creativity await!

  • Learn & Play: Master the art of railroading with new interactive tutorials in the New Haven Industrial and Datsun Junction routes, perfect for sharpening your skills.

  • Build Your Dream Layouts: Design and construct your own model railways using our intuitive "Surveyor Classic" mode—a robust tool for building everything from intricate track plans to stunning landscapes.

Discover a World of Free Content:

  • Access the incredible Download Station (DLS) with over 600,000 free items—from detailed locomotives to immersive scenery and beyond. (Requires a MyTrainz Account.)

  • Get started with ease! Enjoy a FREE 1-Month First Class Ticket (FCT) for fast and unlimited downloads. (Requires a MyTrainz Account.)

Endless Fun, Zero Clutter

TRS22 Model Railroaders Edition is your gateway to exploring, building, and enjoying model railways on a whole new level. No space? No problem! Your virtual layout is waiting—start your journey today!

Included Routes:

The following routes are included in TRS22 Model Railroaders Edition.

The New Haven Industrial

Big Operations on a Small Scale: The New Haven Industrial Model Railroad

Dive into the heart of industrial railroading with the New Haven Industrial Model Railroad, a compact yet action-packed route designed for precision and skill. Set in a bustling industrial hub serviced by CSX, this layout is tailored for operators who thrive on tight maneuvers and clever problem-solving.

What Makes This Route Stand Out?

  • Challenging Operations: With tight curves and limited space, only SW1200 and SW1500 locomotives can navigate these tracks. One wrong move could place your locomotive on the wrong end of your train—are you up to the challenge?

  • Compact Yet Mighty: Don’t let the size fool you—this route offers big operational potential with industries that demand skillful handling and strategic thinking.

Special Features to Enhance Your Experience:

  • Custom Achievements: Test your skills and unlock exclusive achievements as you conquer the challenges of this intricate industrial layout. View your progress by navigating to System Menu > Achievements.

Why You'll Love It:
Perfect for fans of industrial railroading and those who enjoy overcoming operational challenges, the New Haven Industrial Model Railroad packs a lot of action into a small, engaging package. Whether you're mastering tight curves or planning the perfect move to deliver goods, every session is a rewarding experience.

Get on Board Today!
The New Haven Industrial Model Railroad isn’t just a layout—it’s a test of your skills and a celebration of the art of industrial railroading. Are you ready to take on the challenge?

The Wattz & Voltz Interurban

Discover the Electrifying World of the Wattz & Voltz Interurban Railroad!

Step into a world where freight takes center stage, and the charm of interurban railroads comes alive. The Wattz & Voltz Interurban Railroad offers an immersive experience with bustling freight operations, occasional passenger services, and a layout packed with diverse industries and stunning scenery.

What Makes This Layout Spark?

  • A Route with Personality: Connect the towns of Wattz, Ohmz, Ampz, and Voltz, each featuring on-street running for a classic interurban feel.

  • Industrial Marvels: Explore the Hertz Plateau, home to a log camp, dry sort yard, and sawmill. Visit Wattz for its thriving industrial area, Class 1 railroad interchange, and unique railroad barge ferry.

  • Diverse Freight Operations: Handle boxcar deliveries to factories, haul logs to sawmills, transport wood chips to paper and printing factories, and deliver essential coal and gasoline supplies.

Two Unique Versions:

  • Wattz & Voltz Interurban Railroad: Experience the original layout with overhead wires, capturing the true essence of interurban railroads.

  • Wattz & Voltz Railroad: A no-wires version designed for a classic diesel-powered experience, offering a fresh take on the same route.

Features That Shine:

  • Cutting-Edge Visuals: Enjoy PBR procedural tracks, PBR textures, TurfFX grasses, and SpeedTrees for a breathtaking, lifelike environment.

  • Fully Seasonal: Watch the scenery transform with the seasons, from ground textures to tree foliage.

  • Endless Gameplay: Includes 8 sessions (4 per version), plus "free drive" sessions for you to explore and master the route at your own pace.

Unleash Your Inner Railroader!
Whether you're hauling freight, navigating tight street tracks, or marveling at the seasonal beauty, the Wattz & Voltz Railroad offers something for every rail enthusiast. Get ready for a high-voltage adventure like no other!

Datsun Junction

Get on Track with the Ultimate Model Railway Experience: Datsun Junction!

From the acclaimed creator of Coal Country and Eagle River Railway comes Datsun Junction, a compact yet thrilling layout that's perfect for both seasoned operators and casual enthusiasts. This AI-friendly route delivers non-stop action, intricate challenges, and endless replayability.

Why You'll Love It:

  • Dynamic Trackside Action: Sit back and marvel at the seamless movement of AI trains navigating loops through towns, industries, and even through walls, creating an immersive and lively environment.

  • Interactive Gameplay: Take control and put your skills to the test with switching tasks and delivery challenges designed to keep you engaged and entertained.

  • Years in the Making: This heavily refined and enhanced version of Datsun Junction has been perfected over years of development, making it the ultimate addition to your virtual model railway collection.

Included Sessions:

  • AI Action: Watch as five AI-controlled consists negotiate the route, creating a bustling, lifelike railway scene.

  • Hands-On Driving: Take the throttle and deliver essential goods to industries scattered throughout the map.

The Perfect Virtual Basement Layout!
Datsun Junction is a must-have for fans of intricate layouts and captivating railroading experiences. Whether you're a spectator or a hands-on operator, there's something for everyone in this timeless masterpiece.

Santa Fe, Needles District 2.0

Step into the Rails of History with the Upgraded Santa Fe, Needles District 2.0 Route!

Experience the thrill of the rails like never before with the enhanced Santa Fe, Needles District 2.0! Inspired by the iconic layout featured in Model Railroader Magazine's celebrated 2009 special issue "102 Realistic Track Plans" (originally published in September 2002), this stunning model railroad layout brings the magic of the Santa Fe Railway to life in incredible detail.

What Awaits You:

  • Faithful Design: Immerse yourself in a masterfully compacted representation of California’s historic Barstow and Needles rail yards.

  • Hidden Surprises: Explore the intricacies of a sprawling, cleverly concealed staging yard, perfect for dynamic operations.

  • Enhanced by Experts: Originally crafted by the renowned Approach Medium and meticulously expanded and upgraded by N3V Games for Trainz Model Railroad 2.

Interactive Sessions:
Get ready to take the helm in two engaging freight-hauling sessions, featuring a variety of authentic locomotives and rolling stock. Whether you're a seasoned rail enthusiast or a newcomer, this route offers hours of immersive, hands-on fun.

All Aboard for Adventure!

Rediscover the joy of model railroading in a fully digital experience that combines nostalgia with cutting-edge upgrades.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 13
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz (M1 Recommended)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-Supporting GPU
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

name: TRS22 Model Railroaders Edition

subs.option_text: TRS22 Model Railroaders Edition Volume 1 - $39.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese
